actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to require that the Attorney General conduct a study regarding the ability of the Federal Bureau of Investigation to prevent and combat international crimes involving children, and for other purposes.
short_title: International Child Safety Improvement Act of 2002

summary.text: International Child Safety Improvement Act of 2002 - Directs: (1) the Attorney General to study and report to Congress on the ability of the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) to prevent and combat international crimes involving children; and (2) the FBI to coordinate and share information regarding any investigation of international crimes involving children with the International Criminal Police Organization.

titles.title: International Child Safety Improvement Act of 2002

A bill to require that the Attorney General conduct a study regarding the ability of the Federal Bureau of Investigation to prevent and combat international crimes involving children, and for other purposes.
